enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The contact group, co-chaired by Halldor Thorgeirsson (Iceland) and Philip Gwage (Uganda), expressed diverging views on timing for consideration of the need for country-specific data and information and its relationship to a decision-making framework in the context of the Protocol.
There was general agreement on the consideration of the IPCC Special Report at SBSTA-12.
The group also agreed to initiate an exchange views on a decision-making framework and on data requirements.
